text: Aru moi etu eke kotha khan likhi ase, eneka hoile jitia moi ahibo, moi jun khan uporte moi laga mon khushi thakibo lage, taikhan pora moi laga mon dukh nakoribo karone, aru moi apnikhan sobke pura mon pora biswas ase ami laga khushi to apnikhan sob laga khushi hobo koi kene2.3 Paul to Corinthia girja ke tinta chithi likhise. Kintu ekta to haraise. Yate Paul etu koi ase..
